card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NYou can only control 1 "Gashadokuro, the Skeletal Mayakashi". You can only use each of these effects of "Gashadokuro, the Skeletal Mayakashi" once per turn.$N●If a Link Monster in your possession is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other Zombie monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card.$N●If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can activate this effect; this turn, this face-up card is unaffected by other cards' effects.
